data.title: Grazia Deledda – Documentary
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 1926 was awarded to Grazia Deledda "for her idealistically inspired writings which with plastic clarity picture the life on her native island and with depth and sympathy deal with human problems in general"
data.text:
Grazia Deledda

Documentary

Your browser does not support the video tag.

A short clip of Grazia Deledda and her husband, Palmiro Madesani, after they visited the headquarters of the Italian Diplomatic mission at Oakhill in Djurgården, Stockholm. Grazia Deledda arrived in Stockholm for the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony held on 10 December 1927. (The Nobel Prize in Literature for 1926 was awarded in 1927.)

From SF Veckorevy 1927-12-12.
